title: Peace With Yourself | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Peace With Yourself | Joel Osteen
description:
We all have areas that we need to improve. But when you choose to dwell on your shortcomings, you limit your potential. Learn to see yourself the way God sees you. He wants to do incredible things through your life.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
